abstract: UFC champion Jon Jones turns himself into authorities in connection with hit-and-run crash in Albuquerque, NM.
lead_paragraph: Jon Jones, the light heavyweight champion in the Ultimate Fighting Championship, ran from a car crash in Albuquerque, N.M., that hospitalized a pregnant woman, the police said

headline.main: Jon Jones of the U.F.C. Turns Himself In After Car Crash
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Mixed Martial Arts; U.F.C. Fighter Sought After Car Crash

snippet: Jon Jones, the light heavyweight champion in the Ultimate Fighting Championship, ran from a car crash in Albuquerque, N.M., that hospitalized a pregnant woman, the police said
